description: Video tutorials on Ansible.

description: Free Video Course on Ansible including labs to follow along.

description: YouTube tutorial series by LearnLinuxTV.

name: Ansible Tower
description: Ansible Tower by Red Hat helps you scale IT automation, manage complex deployments and speed productivity. Extend the power of Ansible to your entire team.

name: AWX
description: AWX provides a web-based user interface, REST API, and task engine built on top of Ansible. It is the upstream project for Tower, a commercial derivative of AWX.

name: Ansible Lint
description: Checks Playbooks for best practices and behavior that could potentially be improved.

name: Ansible Later
description: Another best practice scanner. Checks Playbooks and Roles for best practices and behavior that could potentially be improved.

name: Ansible Doctor
description: Simple annotation like documentation generator for Ansible roles based on Jinja2 templates.

name: Ansible cmdb
description: Takes the output of Ansible's fact gathering and converts it into a static HTML page.

name: ARA
description: ARA Records Ansible playbooks and makes them easier to understand and troubleshoot with a reporting API, UI and CLI.

name: Mitogen for Ansible
description: Speed up Ansible substantially with Mitogen.

name: Molecule
description: Molecule aids in the development and testing of Ansible roles.

name: Packer Ansible Provisioner
description: This Provisioner can be used to automate VM Image creation via Packer with Ansible.

name: Excel Ansible Inventory
description: Turn any Excel Spreadsheet into an Ansible Inventory.

name: terraform.py
description: Ansible dynamic inventory script for parsing Terraform state files.

name: ansible-navigator
description: A text-based user interface (TUI) for Ansible.

name: squest
description: Self-service portal for Ansible Tower job templates.

name: ansible-bender
description: Tool which bends containers using Ansible playbooks and turns them into container images.

name: ansible-runner
description: A tool and python library that helps when interfacing with Ansible directly or as part of another system whether that be through a container image interface, as a standalone tool, or as a Python module that can be imported.

name: ansible-builder
description: Using Ansible content that depends on non-default dependencies can be tricky. Packages must be installed on each node, play nicely with other software installed on the host system, and be kept in sync.

name: ansible-toolset
description: Ansible Toolset combines all ansible development tools in a single container: ansible, ansible-lint and molecule.

name: kics
description: SAST Tool that scans your ansible infrastructure as code playbooks for security vulnverables, compliance issues and misconfigurations.

name: php-ansible Library
description: OOP-Wrapper for Ansible, making Ansible available in PHP.

name: TD4A
description: Design aid for building and testing jinja2 templates, combines data in yaml format with a jinja2 template and render the output.

name: Ansible Playbook Grapher
description: Command line tool to create a graph representing your Ansible playbook plays, tasks and roles.

name: Ansible (Real Life) Good Practices
description: Best practice guidelines.

name: Testing Ansible Roles Against Windows with Test-Kitchen
description: Using Test-Kitchen with Ansible to apply playbooks to Windows machines and test them with Pester.

name: Ansible Best Practices by AndiDog
description: Practices covering many aspects of an Ansible setup, including hints to support different environments (testing, staging, production).

name: Ansible auf My-IT-Brain
description: Articles about different topics regarding Ansbile, e.g. modules, roles, use cases, etc.

name: Ansible Vagrant Examples by geerlingguy
description: Ansible examples using Vagrant to deploy to local VMs.

name: Ansible playbook for Linux machine setup
description: Ansible playbook for setting up a self-updating, hardened Debian/Ubuntu machine with Docker daemon.

name: DevSec Hardening Framework
description: The DevSec collection helps you harden your Linux Based OS as well as MySQL, NGINX and SSH Server/Services.

name: T.A.D.S. boilerplate
description: Provision and deploy a Docker Swarm cluster to development environment and to production. Infrastructure as Code and DevOps best practices.

name: Openstack Ansible
description: Ansible Playbooks for deploying OpenStack.

name: DebOps
description: A extensive collection of Debian based Ansible Playbooks.

name: ansible-ssm
description: An ansible role to provision physical and virtual hosts with the AWS SSM agent.

name: BlueBanquise
description: An ansible coherent roles collection to deploy clusters.
